section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
goals__remit:
Our vision 
Technology for a better society 
 
Our role 
Creating value by applying knowledge, research and innovation 
    Developing knowledge and technology that can be applied 
    Working as an R&D partner with industry and the public sector 
    Developing new companies 
    Delivering solutions for sustainable development 
    Building and operating research laboratories   
    Providing premises for social debate and policy decisions 
 
Our characteristics 
    We are a multidisciplinary research organization with world class expertise in specific fields 
    We cooperate closely with universities, the authorities and industry 
    We have the ability to see opportunities, develop and create successful solutions for our customers and partners 
    We combine the cultures of research and business 
    We take social responsibility and ensure that high ethical standards are applied to all of our activities 
 
Our basic values 
Honesty    Generosity    Courage    Solidarity
